text: @realDonaldTrump My wife who is an RN here in WA is having shifts cut because the hospital is loosing $ so fast.  Not to mention her floor is ground zero for Covid19 response in Tacoma WA. Our frontline fighters are getting money taken away instead of supporting them. @GovInslee
